name: Open Profiler
short_description:
Open Profiler is a utility for monitoring amount of time, which a user spends on every foreground window.
The Open profiler consist of two parts: 

serverside (AWPcons.exe) and clientside 

(AWPL.class). 
First of all run the serverside. It listen
on 5000 port for incoming connections
from clients.
Then run one or more clients. Go to 
client's "Observe" menu and click on
"Hosts" option. Then click on "Add new
host button". In appearing dialogue
specify the IP where server was run.
Click on "Start measurement" to start
the profiling process.
That's it.

If you have some problems, 
new ideas or you want to
finish this project, contact me, please.

Sincerely yours,
Pigovsky (pigovsky at gmail dot com).
summary: Open Profiler is for monitoring time of foreground window usage
